title: Episode #48: Survival And Prepping With Creek Stewart
description: In today's episode I talk to Creek Stewart, owner of Willow Haven Outdoor, and author of Building the Perfect Bug Out Bag: Your 72-Hour Disaster Survival Kit. His most recent book is The Unofficial Hunger Games Survival Guide. Creek and I discuss his new book and things that you can do now to prepare for an emergency.
author: contact@artofmanliness.com (The Art of Manliness)
